TextView.android:text: Handout is a versatile application that helps users find food, rental homes, and other services. The app is designed to make it easy for users to search and discover a variety of options for their needs.

For food delivery, Handout allows users to browse through a range of restaurants and cafes in their area, filter by cuisine and price range, and read reviews from other customers. Users can also place orders directly through the app.

For rental homes, Handout partners with trusted real estate agents and property managers to offer a variety of options for users. Users can search for homes based on their location, budget, and other preferences, and communicate directly with property managers through the app.

In addition to food and rental homes, Handout also offers a range of other services, such as home cleaning, Plumbing , Electrician etc. Users can easily communicate with service providers through the app.

Overall, Handout is a valuable app for anyone looking for food, rental homes, or other services. It provides a convenient and reliable way to access a variety of options from trusted providers, all in one place. Whether you're hungry, looking for a new home, or need help with household tasks, Handout has got you covered.
